Arasaka Acid.name: Arasaka Säurefluid
Arasaka Acid.description: Coating for Arasaka Weeping Reaver Katana only.

Arasaka Fire.name: Arasaka Feuerfluid
Arasaka Fire.description:
Coating for Arasaka Weeping Reaver Katana only.

Can set target on fire, details of which can be found on page 91.

Arasaka Wound Salt.name: Arasaka Wundsalzfluid
Arasaka Wound Salt.description:
Coating for Arasaka Weeping Reaver Katana only.

Able to apply a second a seconde Critical Injury, details of which can be found on page 91.

Doberman 500 Marking Scent.name: Doberman 500 Markierduft
Doberman 500 Marking Scent.description: Special Ammo Type for the Air Pistol. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 44.

Grenade (Arachnid).name: Granate (Arachnid)
Grenade (Arachnid).description: A very sticky grenade, details of which can be found on page 86.

Grenade (KTech Security).name: Grenade (KTech Security)
Grenade (KTech Security).description: Armor piercing Grenade. Deals damage to targets but not to cover.

Grenade (Shuriken Tornado).name: Granate (Shuriken Tornado)
Grenade (Shuriken Tornado).description: A literal explosion of shurikens. Can apply second Critical Injury, details of which can be found on page 87.

Net.name: Fangnetz
Net.description: Net for the net launcher that grapples the target on hit. (See Black Chrome Pg. 20-21 for more details)

Rocks.name: Steine
Rocks.description: Kleine Munition, die mit dem Nomad Rocker verwendet werden kann. Kleine Felsen und Steine, welche sich in der Nähe befinden, können gesammelt und als Munition benutzt werden.
